body: Concept ACK.
Could [scripted diff](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/developer-notes.md#scripted-diffs) be used for renaming commits?
Sorry, the ci tests failed because I seemed to have left `debugwindow.ui` instead of changing it to `nodewindow.ui` in `src/Makefile.qt.include`.
Are there any more changes/edits I need to make?

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.
I think it makes sense to separate the change in user facing name (in a separate PR) from the internal refactoring to change the class name. These can be discussed / bike shedded seperately.
Agree with @laanwj. Also, maybe we can make the current tab the window title and so we don't have to decide for a new name?

> I think it makes sense to separate the change in user facing name (in a separate PR) from the internal refactoring to change the class name. These can be discussed / bike shedded seperately.

Fair enough, I guess I could squash the commits into a single commit (`gui: rename debug window`); with only the [initial commit](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/6cdb9560dc8d301fb96cdb90c2b7c3d6fd0e4399), along with the revert from [this commit](https://github.com/Zero-1729/bitcoin/commit/f8c5496e004202b665d61e8d2f96ce77f82fc072), making this PR only the user facing change.

Then maybe open a separate PR later, with the internal class change and file renames, assuming this PR is merged.

> Agree with @laanwj. Also, maybe we can make the current tab the window title and so we don't have to decide for a new name?

@promag would that be changing the window title of `NodeWidget` (or `RPCConsole`) whenever a tab is set? Explicitly setting the window title to tab text, so `{tab_name} Window`, i.e: `Information Window`, `Console Window`, etc.

E.g:

Console Tab:
![Sample Window 1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23586626/66678162-2b119200-ec63-11e9-9187-df067ecc4700.png)

Is this what you mean? Or am I missing something?

The changes made in this PR are too much, so I have squashed them all to only include the UI facing changes (i.e., the original `gui: rename debug window` commit), as per @laanwj's suggestion. Limiting this PR to the user facing change(s) only (i.e. the renaming of the window title from `Debug window` to `Node window`). That way this would remain a simple PR, instead of a super PR.

Also, with respect to @promag's suggestion, about making the window title the current tab name, I have created a [separate branch](https://github.com/Zero-1729/bitcoin/tree/rename-debug-window-to-tab-name) with the changes included, alongside the internal class change from `RPCConsole` to `NodeWidget`, file renames, etc. That way, assuming those changes are requested, a new PR can easily be opened.

@jonasschnelli  I just cloned [the branch](https://github.com/Zero-1729/bitcoin/tree/rename-debug-window) locally and built it from source, all the tests in `src/test/test_bitcoin-qt` were successful. 👍

The window title properly displays "Node window".
Are there any other checks or changes that need to be done?

> Also, with respect to @promag's suggestion, about making the window title the current tab name, I have created a [separate branch](https://github.com/Zero-1729/bitcoin/tree/rename-debug-window-to-tab-name) with the changes included, alongside the internal class change from `RPCConsole` to `NodeWidget`, file renames, etc. That way, assuming those changes are requested, a new PR can easily be opened.

Oh thanks for the consideration!
@promag are there any more updates?
@Zero-1729 You can [squash your commits](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#squashing-commits).
@fanquake squashed :+1:
Are there any more updates I need to make to the current changes?

I now realize I can't cancel [the review request  I mistakenly made](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17096#event-2825375444) to @promag a while back, as I lack the permissions. He should just ignore the request so I don't waste his time, especially since @hebasto has **ACK**ed the changes.
@Zero-1729 sorry missed your review request.
@promag no worries :+1:.

diff_hunk:
@@ -805,7 +805,7 @@ void RPCConsole::clear(bool clearHistory) QString clsKey = "Ctrl-L"; #endif - message(CMD_REPLY, (tr("Welcome to the %1 RPC console.").arg(PACKAGE_NAME) + "
" + + message(CMD_REPLY, (tr("Welcome to the %1 Node console.").arg(PACKAGE_NAME) + "
" +
body:
in commit 6cdb9560dc8d301fb96cdb90c2b7c3d6fd0e4399:

I think the console is still all about RPC, so could keep the previous name?

" +
body: This is actually RPC.

" + + message(CMD_REPLY, (tr("Welcome to the %1 Node console.").arg(PACKAGE_NAME) + "

body: I assumed changing the message from 'RPC console' to 'Node console' would make the new window name ('Node window') consistent with the welcome message.

" + + message(CMD_REPLY, (tr("Welcome to the %1 Node console.").arg(PACKAGE_NAME) + "

body: The "Node window" has 4 tabs, the RPC console is one of those.

" + + message(CMD_REPLY, (tr("Welcome to the %1 Node console.").arg(PACKAGE_NAME) + "

body: Let me change that

" + + message(CMD_REPLY, (tr("Welcome to the %1 Node console.").arg(PACKAGE_NAME) + "

body: Fixed.

This needs to be updated:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/69a6f1ad1f7ca52b2524ab8322bfa89a9b0ee61b/src/qt/bitcoingui.cpp#L415

But I'm not sure about this shortcut, there's now a shortcut for each tab so maybe drop these?
Also `&N` mnemonic is associated with "Network Traffic" which is a tab in the node window.

> This needs to be updated:
> https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/69a6f1ad1f7ca52b2524ab8322bfa89a9b0ee61b/src/qt/bitcoingui.cpp#L415
> 
> But I'm not sure about this shortcut, there's now a shortcut for each tab so maybe drop these?

So taking out the entire line since [these](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/091747b46ecf06244ce2650028f1833b2e7c5062) [commits](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/8019b6b150ff7444195a238470414c9deec5bf74) make the shortcut unnecessary?

> Also `&N` mnemonic is associated with "Network Traffic" which is a tab in the node window.

Do you have a suggestion as to what mnemonic to replace it with? Or would you rather it be removed completely:

```cpp
openRPCConsoleAction = new QAction(tr("Node window"), this);
```
I'd drop it, not sure about others though.
Got it :+1:

Removing this shortcut is not mentioned in the PR description.
Moreover, I'd prefer to keep it as is.

Refs:
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17128#issuecomment-541457615
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17128#issuecomment-549390052 by @luke-jr 
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17128#issuecomment-549516747 by @jonasschnelli

Oh, my bad, the change was in response to an earlier review by @promag.

Just read the refs and reverted the change :+1:
